# shinydatras

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of shinydatras is to make DATRAS data shine

## Installation

You can install the development version of shinydatras from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fishvice/shinydatras")
```
